title: Activate admin management for athiakash1977@gmail.com with full content editing and registered teams visibility

requirements.text: Ensure the admin email 'athiakash1977@gmail.com' is the single authorized admin credential in both the backend authorization logic (MixinAuthorization / admin verification) and the frontend AdminLogin page. The login form should pre-populate this email and only grant access to this exact address.

quotes: active the admin management with the athiakash1977@gmail.con

acceptanceCriteria: Logging in with athiakash1977@gmail.com and the correct password succeeds and redirects to the admin dashboard.
Logging in with any other email is rejected with an appropriate error message.
The backend admin-only endpoints reject calls from non-admin principals.

requirements.text: On the Admin Dashboard, ensure the Content Management tab (AdminContentManagement component) is fully functional and accessible: all CMS sections (Hero, About, Event Details, Coordinators, Contact) must load current backend data and successfully save edits via the backend mutation hooks.
acceptanceCriteria: All CMS accordion sections (Hero, About, Event Details, Coordinators, Contact) display current content fetched from the backend.
Saving edits in any section updates the backend and reflects the change immediately on the public-facing site.
Only the authenticated admin can access and use the content management tab.

requirements.text: On the Admin Dashboard, ensure the Registrations tab displays a full list of all registered teams/participants with their details (name, team name, email, category, etc.). Include search/filter functionality and a CSV export option. Each registration row should show all relevant fields stored in the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: The Registrations tab lists all submitted registrations fetched from the backend admin-only endpoint.
Each row displays all stored fields (e.g., participant name, team name, email, category, registration ID, timestamp).
Search/filter input narrows the displayed list in real time.
The CSV export button downloads all registration data as a properly formatted CSV file.
The tab is only accessible to the authenticated admin.

requirements.text: Add a dedicated analytics summary card at the top of the Admin Dashboard showing total registered teams count, fetched live from the backend. Ensure the ProtectedRoute guard correctly redirects unauthenticated visitors away from all /admin routes to the AdminLogin page.
acceptanceCriteria: Total registration count is displayed prominently on the dashboard.
Navigating to /admin or /admin/* while unauthenticated redirects to the admin login page.
After successful login the admin is redirected back to the dashboard.

constraints: Only athiakash1977@gmail.com must be the authorized admin email — do not add multi-admin support.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
All backend logic must remain in the single actor in backend/main.mo.
nonGoals: Adding new admin accounts or a multi-admin management system.
Changing the public-facing registration form or public pages.
Implementing Internet Identity (II) based authentication for admin — use existing email/password admin login.
Real-time updates or WebSocket notifications for new registrations.
